attributes.action: Get rid of the means tested busary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are so many students that aren't eligible for a bursary because their parents happen to earn a little bit too much to quialify. This is also the case for nearly all students with self employed parents. I propose we get rid of the means tested bursary to enable the poorer students, who have to try and pay for themselves to study.
